this_title: ลูกผู้ชายไม้ตะพด
introduction: Unveil the legend of the "Powerful Cane" that broke into two pieces: "Whoever possesses both pieces of the cane shall have power over all." Phanthep, the holder of the "Blood Cane," suspects that Mek, a lame man, is the owner of the "Spirit Cane," who helps people under the alias "Luk Phuchai" (Son of a Man). Thus, Phanthep relentlessly pursues Mek to seize the other piece of the cane for himself. Mai, Mek's son, witnesses his father being bullied and strives to stand up and fight to protect those he loves. When one seeks to seize and the other strives to protect, the boy molded by goodness... is about to choose his path to prove himself!
foreign_title: ลูกผู้ชายไม้ตะพด
